import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"./blogpage.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BlogPage(){const[blogs,setBlogs]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchBlogs();},[]);const fetchBlogs=()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:3001/blogs").then(res=>{setBlogs(res.data);// console.log(res.data)
});};const handleDelete=id=>{axios.delete(`http://localhost:3001/blogs/${id}`).then(()=>{fetchBlogs();}).catch(error=>{console.log("Unable to delete post");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-5 text-center blog-page justify-content-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center text-2xl pt-4 pb-5",children:"OUR BLOG"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-con text-center justify-content-center",children:blogs.map(blog=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shadow p-4 blog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/blogs/${blog._id}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"pt-3 title",children:blog.title})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[blog.preview,"..."]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:" pt-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn delete-blog",onClick:()=>handleDelete(blog._id),children:"X"})})]},blog._id))})]});}export default BlogPage;
